comment: Smart data models - Interceptor schema adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.S4BLDG/master/Interceptor/schema.json
description: An interceptor is a device designed and installed in order to separate and retain deleterious, hazardous or undesirable matter while permitting normal sewage or liquids to discharge into a collection system by gravity.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: coverLength
contents.comment: Property. The length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system or the radius (in the case of a circular shape in plan) of the cover of the oil interceptor. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: coverWidth
contents.comment: Property. The length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system of the cover of the oil interceptor. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: hasManufacturer
contents.comment: Property. A relationship identifying the manufacturer of an entity (e.g., device). The value is expected to be a string or a string with language tag.

contents.name: hasModel
contents.comment: Property. A relationship identifying the model of an entity (e.g., device). The value is expected to be a string or a string with language tag.

contents.name: inletConnectionSize
contents.comment: Property. Size of the inlet connection. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: nominalBodyDepth
contents.comment: Property. Nominal or quoted =length, measured along the z-axis of the local coordinate system of the object, of the body of the object. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: nominalBodyLength
contents.comment: Property. Nominal or quoted length, measured along the x-axis of the local coordinate system of the object, of the body of the object. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: nominalBodyWidth
contents.comment: Property. Nominal or quoted length, measured along the y-axis of the local coordinate system of the object, of the body of the object. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: outletConnectionSize
contents.comment: Property. Size of the outlet connection. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ventilatingPipeSize
contents.comment: Property. Size of the ventilating pipe(s). Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: isSubSystemOf
contents.comment: Relationship. A reference to a system(s) that this Physical Object is part of.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
